Traits.Name: Pack Tactics
Traits.Description: When a beast attacks a foe adjacent to an ally, it gains +1 boon on the attack roll.

Traits.Name: Feral
Traits.Description: Always has hatred of the closest foe (can choose if multiple characters are equally distant).

SetupTraits.Name: Monsters
SetupTraits.Description: Beasts do not flee or negotiate.
